Artifact: Your Personal News Curator

Brief: Enter the world of personalized news with Artifact, the app that learns what piques your interest and filters your newsfeed to present the most engaging and pertinent articles and headlines. With Artifact, staying well-informed is effortlessly intelligent â€“ it's like having a personal news assistant at your disposal. The app shines a light on insightful content while muting the irrelevant buzz, allowing you to delve deeper into the topics you love and share your discoveries with friends.
